## Our Mission {background-image="media/long-road.jpg" background-opacity="0.5"}

- Educate healthcare professionals in all aspects of **digital health**.
- Provide **mentoring & tutoring** to aspiring informaticians.
- Develop **prototypes & full-scale healthcare apps**.
- Engage **key stakeholders** in digital transformation.

---

## Education Services {background-image="media/classroom.jpg" background-opacity="0.3"}

- Programming in Healthcare course.
- Machine Learning for Healthcare Professionals.
- AI in Healthcare.
- Frontend Development for Clinicians.
- Customized Digital Health Training for institutions.

---

## Mentoring & Tutoring {background-image="media/one-on-one-at-window.jpg" background-opacity="0.5"}

- **One-on-one mentoring** for career progression in informatics.
- **Coding support** for healthcare professionals learning Python and javascript (essential programming languages for modern healthcare).
- **Tutoring on digital transformation topics**.

---

## Live events - Annual conference {background-image="media/filled-conference-room.jpg" background-opacity="0.3"}

**Let's Talk Digital Conference**

- Focus on learning from frontline innovation and implementation.
- **Open Source, Standards, Learning, and Data**.
- Industry leaders discussing **digital transformation**.
- CPD-accredited event by **The Federation for Informatics Professionals in Health and Care**.

---

## Live events - Webinar Series {background-image="media/microphone-and-computer.jpg" background-opacity="0.3"}

- **Ask a Clinician** series for healthcare tech professionals.
- **Ask Someone in Digital** series - hear from those with digital expertise, working in the field of health.
- **Clinical Safety in Digital Healthcare** - hear from the team on the much needed project on automation and standardisation of clinical safety in digital healthcare (see the [DCSP](https://youtube.com/live/xzLJkN9NLeU)).

---

## Digital Health App Development {background-image="media/app-screen.jpg" background-opacity="0.3"}

- **Prototype & Production-Ready Solutions**
- Supporting clinicians in building **effective** digital health tools
- Developing **open-source frameworks** for healthcare applications.
- Guidance on clinical safety, data protection, and regulatory compliance.

---

## The Essentials of Health Informatics Handbook {background-image="media/open-book-from-side.jpg" background-opacity="0.3"}

- **Community-driven open-source project**.
- Covers **core and advanced topics in clinical informatics**.
- Includes insights from **leading experts & webinars**.
- Springboard webinars get you right into learning these essential healthcare topics.
